title: Allscripts' Sunrise Platform Selected By UHSM, Uptake High
text:
Allscripts Healthcare Solutions, Inc. MDRX recently announced that its Sunrise platform has been selected as an Electronic Patient Record (“EPR”) system by University Hospital of South Manchester NHS Foundation Trust (“UHSM”).

The Sunrise platform provides a complete range of fully integrated inpatient, ambulatory, emergency care and surgical care solutions to electronic health record (EHR) clients.

The growing popularity of Allscripts’ services among hospitals and health systems will significantly enhance the company’s top-line growth opportunities.

It has been a story of constant achievements for Allscripts’ Sunrise platform. From winning industry recognitions to fetching new clients, the platform has indeed lived up to expectations and helped the company achieve growth over time.

In August this year, research company Black Book handed over a coveted recognition to Allscripts for operational superiority. Black Book evaluated 27,194 ballot results on 18 areas of performance in order to grade EHR providers. Allscripts secured the top spot for its solutions such as Allscripts Professional EHR, Allscripts TouchWorks EHR and Allscripts Sunrise Ambulatory Care.
Additionally, the Allscripts Sunrise platform was named as the top inpatient EHR used in large hospitals and academic medical centers in 2014 as well as 2015.

In May 2015, Allscripts’ Sunrise EHR platform was selected by OH-based Grand Lake Health System as the core EHR for its community of medical centers to advance support care and patient management efforts.

In January this year, Sunrise Clinical Manager earned appreciation from KLAS research as the best global acute electronic medical record (EMR) in 2014.
Zacks Rank and Key Picks 
Currently, Allscripts carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold). Better-ranked stocks in the medical sector are Masimo MASI, Mazor Robotics MZOR and NuVasive NUVA. All the stocks sport a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy).
